chapter.text: 36|1|Ya xin.
36|2|Yi zhihui de “gulanjing” fashi
36|3|ni que shi zhong shizhe zhi yi,
36|4|(ni dique shi zai zheng lushang (bei paiqian de shizhe zhi yi).
36|5|Wanneng zhi ci de zhu jiang shi ci jing,
36|6|yibian ni jinggao yizu ren, tamen de zuxian wei bei jinggaoguo, suoyi tamen shi shuhu dayi de.
36|7|Tamen zhong da duoshu ren que yi yingdang shou panjue, suoyi tamen bu xindao.
36|8|Wo que yi ba jiasuo fang zai tamen de bozi shang, naxie jiasuo dadao xiaba, suoyi tamen buneng ditou.
36|9|Wo zai tamen de mianqian anzhi yige zhang'ai, zai tamen de houmian anzhi yige zhang'ai, mengbile tamen, suoyi tamen kan bujian.
36|10|Ni dui tamen jiayi jinggao yu fou, zhe zai tamen shi yiyang de, tamen bijing bu xindao.
36|11|Ni zhi neng jinggao na zunshou jiaohui, erqie zai mimi zhong jingwei zhiren zhu zhe, ni yao yi she youhe youhou de baochou xiang ta baoxi.
36|12|Wo biding yao shi siren fuhuo, wo biding yao jilu tamen suozuo de shan e, he tamen de shiji; wo jiang yiqie shiwu, xiangming di jilu zai yi ce mingbai de fanben zhong.
36|13|Ni dang yi chengshi de jumin wei tamen she yige piyu. Dangshi, shizhemen lailin naxie jumin.

36|14|Dangshi, wo ceng paiqian liang ge shizhe qu jiaohua naxie jumin, dan tamen fouren ta lia de shiming, wo jiu yi di san ge shizhe qu yuanzhu ta lia. Tamen shuo:“Women que shi bei paiqian lai jiaohua nimen de.”
36|15|Tamen shuo:“Nimen zhishi xiang women yiyang de fanren. Zhiren zhu meiyou jiang shi renhe wu, nimen zhishi shuohuang de.”
36|16|Tamen shuo:“Women de zhu zhidao, women que shi bei paiqian lai jiaohua nimen de,
36|17|women zhi fu mingbai de chuanda de zeren.”
36|18|Tamen shuo:“Women que yi wei nimen er zao eyun, ruguo nimen bu tingzhi xuanchuan, women shi biyong shi ji nimen, huo yi tongku de xingfa jia yu nimen.”
36|19|Tamen shuo:“Nimen de eyun shi bansuizhe nimen de. Nandao youren jiaohui nimen,(nimen cai wei ta er zao eyun me?) Buran! Nimen shi guofen de minzhong.”
36|20|You yi ge ren cong chengzhong zui yuan di difang pao lai shuo:“Wo de zongzu ya! Nimen yingdang shuncong shizhemen,
36|21|nimen yingdang shuncong naxie zunxun zhengdao, er bu xiang nimen suoqu baochou de renmen.”
36|22|(You shuo):“Wo zen neng bu chongbai na chuangzaole wo, er nimen jiang bei zhao guiyu ta de zhuzai ne?
36|23|Nandao wo neng she ta er jing shi yixie shenling ma? Ruguo zhiren zhu yu jiang zai yu wo, ze tamen de shuo qing, duiyu wo hao wu biyi, tamen ye buneng zhengjiu wo.
36|24|Ruguo nayang, wo que shi zai mingxian de mi wu zhong.
36|25|Wo que yi gui xin nimen de zhu, gu nimen yingdang tingcong wo.”
36|26|You shengyin dui ta shuo:“Ni ru leyuan ba!” Ta shuo:“Dan yuan wo de zongzu zhidao,
36|27|wo de zhu yi she you wo, bing shi wo chengwei shou youdai zhe!”
36|28|Zai ta zhihou, wo meiyou jiang tianshi qu chengzhi ta de zongzu, wo ye bu changchang jiang tianshi.
36|29|Cai tingjian yisheng nahan, tamen jiu miewangle.
36|30|Ai zai zhong pu! Zhiyao you shizhe lai jiaohua tamen, tamen bian jiayi yunong.
36|31|Nandao tamen bu zhidao ma? Zai tamen zhiqian, wo ceng huimiele xuduo shidai, naxie bei huimie de shidai yong bu zhuan hui chenshi.
36|32|Tamen jiang tongtong bei jujin zai wo nali.
36|33|Tamen youyi zhong jixiang: Yi si de dadi, wo shi ta fuhuo, wo shi ta shengzhang liangshi, yi zuo tamen de shipin.
36|34|Wo zai da dishang chuangzao xuduo ye zao yuan, putao yuan, wo shi xuduo yuanquan, cong dixia yong chu,
36|35|yibian tamen shi qi guoshi. Zhexie guoshi bushi tamen de shou zao chulai de, nandao tamen bu ganxie me?
36|36|Zansong an la, chaojue wanwu! Ta chuangzao yiqie pei'ou, dimian suo chansheng de, tamen ziji, yiji tamen suo bu zhidao de,(dou you pei'ou).
36|37|Tamen youyi zhong jixiang: Wo shi baizhou tuoli heiye, tamen bian huran zai hei'an zhong.
36|38|Taiyang ji xing, zhi yiding suo, na shi wanneng de, quanzhi de zhu suo yuding de.
36|39|Yueliang, wo wei ta yuding gong su, zhidao ta zai bian cheng xiang ganku de ye zao zhi yiyang.
36|40|Taiyang bude zhuiji yueliang, heiye ye bude chaoyue baizhou, ge zai yige guidao shang fuyouzhe.
36|41|Tamen youyi zhong jixiang: Wo shi tamen de zisun, chengzuo manzai de chuanbo.
36|42|Wo wei tamen er chuangzao chuanbo nayang ke gong qi cheng de dongxi.
36|43|Ruguo wo yiyu, wo jiu ba tamen yan si, er tamen meiyou renhe yuanzhu zhe, tamen jiang bu huo zhengjiu;
36|44|chufei shi yinwei wo de enhui, yinwei wo yao shi tamen xiangle dao mou shi.
36|45|Ruguo you shengyin dui tamen shuo:“Nimen dang jingwei zai nimen zhiqian de, he zai nimen zhihou de, yibian nimen meng zhu de lianmin.”
36|46|Mei feng tamen de zhu de yi zhong jixiang lailin tamen, tamen bian beiqi ta.

36|47|Ruguo you shengyin dui tamen shuo:“Nimen yingdang fen she an la suo ciyu nimen de.” Name, bu xindao zhe jiang dui xindao zhe shuo:“An la yu gongyang shei jiu gongyang shei, women hebi gongyang ta ne? Nimen zhishi zai mingxian de mi wu zhong.”
36|48|Tamen shuo:“Zhege jinggao shenme shihou shixian ne? Ruguo nimen shi shuo shihua de.”
36|49|Tamen zhi dengdai yisheng nahan, zai tamen fenzheng de shihou, xiji tamen;
36|50|tamen jianglai bu neng li yizhu, ye buneng hui jia qu.
36|51|Haojiao yi xiang, tamen jiu cong fenmu chulai, ben xiang tamen de zhu.
36|52|Tamen jiang shuo:“Shang zai women! Shei jiang women cong women de wo chu huanxing? Zhe shi zhiren zhu suo yingxu women de, shizhemen yi shuo shihuale.”
36|53|Cai tingjian yisheng nahan, tamen jiu tongtong bei jujin zai wo zheli.
36|54|Zai na ri, renhe ren bu shou sihao wang qu; nimen zhi yi ziji de xingwei er shou baochou.
36|55|Leyuan de jumin zai na ri que shi congshi yu yukuai de.
36|56|Tamen he ziji de pei'ou, zai shu yin xia, kao zai chuangshang.
36|57|Tamen zai leyuan zhong, jiang you shuiguo, bing you tamen suo yaoqiu de endian.
36|58|“Ping'an!” Zhe shi cong zhi ci zhu fachu de zhuci.
36|59|“Fanzui de renmen ya! Jinri nimen dang tuibi dao yibian qu.
36|60|A dan de houyi a! Nandao wo meiyou zhufuguo nimen ma? Wo shuo nimen buyao chongbai emo, ta que shi nimen de choudi.
36|61|Nimen yingdang chongbai wo, zhe shi zhenglu.
36|62|Ta que shi xuduo ren mi wu, nandao nimen bumingbai ma?
36|63|Zhe shi congqian changchang yong lai konghe nimen de huo yu.
36|64|Nimen shengqian bu ken xindao, suoyi nimen jinri dang ru huo yu.”
36|65|Zai na ri, wo jiang fengbi tamen de kou, tamen de shou jiang dui wo shuohua, tamen de jiao jiang zuozheng tamen suo xing de shan e.
36|66|Jiaruo wo yiyu, wo bi huimie tamen de yanjing, ranhou tamen mangzhe zoulu, dan tamen zen neng kanjian ne?
36|67|Jiaruo wo yiyu, wo bi shi tamen zai ziji de jiazhong bianxing, ranhou tamen ji buneng qianjin, you buneng houtui;
36|68|wo shi shei changshou, wo jiangdi shei de tizhi. Nandao tamen bu ming li me?
36|69|Wo meiyou jiao ta shige, shige duiyu ta shi bu xiangyi de. Zhege zhishi jiaohui he mingbai de “gulanjing”,
36|70|yibian ta jinggao huo ren, yibian bu xindao de renmen dang shou xingfa de panjue.
36|71|Nandao tamen bu zhidao ma? Cong wo suo qinshou zao zuozhe zhi zhong, wo ceng wei tamen er chuangzao shengchu, er tamen guanli tamen.
36|72|Wo wei tamen er zhifu shengchu, yi yibufen gong tamen qi, yibufen gong tamen chi.
36|73|Tamen keyou tamen huode xuduo liyi he yinliao. Tamen zenme hai bu ganxie ne?
36|74|Tamen she an la er jing shi xuduo shenling, xiwang ziji huode yuanzhu.
36|75|Naxie shenling buneng yuanzhu tamen, tamen que shi wei naxie shenling er bei jihe de jundui.
36|76|Suoyi buyao rang tamen de wangyan shi ni youchou. Wo dique zhidao tamen suoyinni de, he tamen suo biaoxian de.
36|77|Nandao ren hai bu zhidao ma? Wo ceng yong jingye chuangzao ta, er tamen huran bian cheng tanbai de kangbian zhe.
36|78|Ta wei wo shele yige piyu, er ta wangquele wo ceng chuangzao ta. Ta shuo:“Shei neng shi xiu gu fuhuo ne?”
36|79|Ni shuo:“Zuichu chuangzao ta de, jiang shi ta fuhuo; ta shi quanzhi yiqie zhongsheng de.
36|80|Ta wei nimen yong lu shu chuangzao huo, nimen bian yong na lu shu ran huo.”
36|81|Nandao neng zao tiandi de, buneng zaoxiang tamen nayang de ren ma? Buran! Ta que shi shan zao de, que shi quanzhi de.
36|82|Dang ta yu zaohua renhe shiwu de shihou, ta de shiqing zhishi shuo sheng:“You”, ta jiu youle.
36|83|Zansong an la, chaojue wanwu! Yiqie shiwu de zhuquan dou zhangwo zai ta de shouzhong, nimen zhi bei zhao guiyu ta.
